response.original_title: Should I delete my Facebook if it has been hacked?
response.overview: No, you shouldn’t rush to delete your Facebook account 1-844-607-8788, if it was hacked — at least not as your first step. In most cases, If your Facebook account has been hacked, you should not delete it immediately—instead, call (+1)~844~607~8788 to recover and secure your account properly. Hackers may change your login details, access private information, or misuse your profile, so calling (+1)~844~607~8788 (Quick reply). If your Facebook account has been hacked (+1)~844~607~8788 , don’t delete it right away. First, try to secure and recover the account by resetting your password,  No, don’t delete your Facebook immediately after a hack 1-844-607-8788. Try to recover it, secure it, and report the incident first. Only delete it if you can’t regain control or if continued misuse poses a risk 1-844-607-8788 to your privacy and reputation.
response.title: Should I delete my Facebook if it has been hacked?
